name: Grapnes 2: Kepnalcide
description:
--- Plot:

Set many years after the failed liberation attempts of the Grapnesian people, Grapnes II follows the path of Gary the Grapnesian as he fights for the freedom of his people from the cruel, shrine-biting Kepnals. Along the way you will encounter many strange and mysterious beasts, make new friends, and have a rip-roaring good time.

--- Features:

  • Active-time RPG gameplay!
  • Over 1 playable character! (Planned to have over 2 in the future!)
  • Shrines!
  • A minigame!
  • Puzzles galore!
  • Blueberries of all colours!
  • Colour-based type matchup system!
  • Pirates! (And later, Vikings!)
  • Dinosaurs! (Coming soon...)
  • Shapes! (Geometric, polygonal, you name it!)

--- Controls:

Arrow keys:Movement/Menu navigation
Space/Enter/Control: Confirm/Interact
Escape/Alt: Back/Open menu
Escape/Tab: Hold to run from battles

--- Please Note:

This game is in an early alpha state. You may encounter bugs and other unintended oddities.

--- Migrating Saves:

If you wish to keep your saved games to use in a newer version of the game, copy the "grapnes2.saves" directory from the old version into the newer version's folder. This is NOT recommended however, since low-level changes in the game could cause things to break. Please don't submit bug reports if you've copied saves between versions, thanks.

--- Public Notice:

We can't stress this enough: PLEASE don't bite the shrines.
